main event: Two housewives reported seeing a pie-shaped UFO with a strange white light dangling from the bottom in Barre, Vermont on April 20, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2 to 3 minutes,It appeared to move up and down with a vibrating motion,The size of the object was estimated to be 2 to 3 feet in diameter,The witnesses were two civilian housewives who reported the sighting while talking on the phone,The report concluded that the object resembled a lightweight lid cover, possibly being affected by high winds.
